byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman and Alan Blinder contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: The president made the comments after he was criticized for failing to denounce the rise in anti-Jewish threats and actions since his inauguration.
snippet: The president made the comments after he was criticized for failing to denounce the rise in anti-Jewish threats and actions since his inauguration....

headline.main: In First, Trump Condemns Rise in Anti-Semitism, Calling It ‘Horrible’
headline.print_headline: After Weeks of Silence, Trump Condemns a Rise in Anti-Semitic Threats
